Background This year, 2026 to alleviate any doubt, and this year i&rsquo;ve set myself the ambition to focus on tangibly improving at Machine Learning and Reverse Engineering. Both are topics i&rsquo;ve studied in my career and during my university degree. But with neither I feel like I have as much knowledge of as I would like, whilst also happening to be fascinating fields of study.
Unfortunately with anything unless you&rsquo;re constantly exercising with an aim to improve and deepen your …
